name: Lost Treasures (Deadlycrow Games)
description:
**DISCLAIMER**

**THIS IS NOT A DEADLYCROWGAMES GAMES PER-SE, BUT A GAMEJAM VIDEOGAME MADE FROM A TEAM WHERE TWO OF THE MEMBERS WERE/ARE MEMBERS OF  DEADLYCROWGAMES**

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey this is a game that I (Mr. Croww) developed over a whole weekend with a team of nice people at the "Global GameJam 2021" event, i'm uploading the project here, since we decided to finish polishing it but GGJ page won't take more submissions!, so here we are! with the game itself, and shortly i will be uploading the whole source code :) enjoy it!

The game: A fully procedural island each time you play, enemy locations, start position, coin bags, etc. Almost everything in this short game is randomly generated, including the input control! because you are a drunk pirate! so be careful about your movement :)

PLOT:

You are a drunken pirate that lost all his treasure and his beloved Anastasia after a wild night of gambling and bar fights. For some unknown reason you wake up the next day stranded in some island. You figure out that all this misfortune was caused by the vicious pirate lord that goes by the name of "Little Fin", so in order to get your treasures back you need to kill all his minions and face "Little Fin" himself at the end of the game.
